documentation.synopsis:
iModem App is an interface with Tritech Micron Modem. Those modem could be configured to master or slave. To do so, hold a magnet near main port when powering up and use Seanet.exe to configure the modem.
This App is adapted to Modem configuration with an electromagnet.
CAUTION! Tritech Micron Modem in configuration mode communicate through serial baudrate 57600 htat is not referenced for MoOOSLinuxSerialPort.
Please update MOOSCore/Core/libMOOS/Utils/MOOSLinuxSerialPort.cpp and add case 57600: nLinuxBaudRate = B57600; break;
In function bool CMOOSLinuxSerialPort::Create(const char * sPort, int nBaudRate)
Finally Rebuild moos
